arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
وَارْحَمْنِيْ وَتَجَاوَزْ عَنْ سَيِّئاتِيْ وَمَا عِنْدِيْ
translation: In the Name of Allāh, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.
O' Allāh send Your blessings on Muhammad and the family of Muhammad.
O He Who overlooks slips, (please] overlook my slip.
O He Who responds to prayers, (please] respond to my prayer.
O He Who hears all sounds, (please] listen to mine,
have mercy on me, and excuse my wrongdoings and whatever I have committed.
O Lord of majesty and honor!
transliteration: allāhumma ṣalli `alā muḥammadin wa āli muḥammad
